creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
markings: mark: heart with small e in it
text: Mr. Nonsense is in love and hastens to woo the object of his affections with flowers and music. Even if such ploys fail to conquer her heart, surely his snug chartreuse breeches will do the trick.
title: Mr. Des-fadaises (Mr. Nonsense)
